model

Class AbstractPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractPiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Piece
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IPiece, JPiece, LPiece, OPiece, SPiece, TPiece, ZPiece

    public abstract class AbstractPiece
extends java.lang.Object
implements Piece, java.lang.Cloneable
    Provides default behavior for Tetris Pieces.
    Version:
    Autumn 2015
    Author:
    Alan Fowler
